text: It would be convenient to return home without a name: if, for example, your nanny wanted to call you to study the lesson, she could say nothing more than "Come here...!", and there she would be cut off, because she would have no name to call you by and, then, of course, you would not have to make any case for her. Alice through the mirror, 1871
title: Volver sin nombre
author: Lewis Carroll
